title: The Workman
description: A collection of 5 short stories Night HunterThe contrast between regular marines and the elite snipers is never more evident that at this forward operating base deep in the Vietnam jungles. John and Walter rely on each other in this deadly killing zone.Scrapbook GeorgeThe rookie detective wants to make his mark. Pouring over crime scene photos he notices a street bum sitting up against a wall. Will the detective get anything useful from this unusual witness?LumberjackJules and Emile, two young French woodsmen,learn all about themselves and the wilderness when left alone in the bush of Northern Quebec.One More DayAs German Soldiers retreat across Russia, there aren't many places to hide. This soldier finds one, but discovers he must stay there longer than intended. All he wants to do is make it One More Day.The Mr. JonesKaren gets a glimpse into the strange life of the Jones', but the Jones' don't turn out to be exactly like she thought they would.
author: Rejean Giguere
